documents.document: @ateDARYL yes and he introduced me baseball. I think I inherited his tendency to stress out over teams I like. Baseball is the worst...
@ateDARYL my grandfather was told by his cardiologist to stop watching sports. MD was worried it would give him another heart attack 😟
@JodiesJumpsuit my 12 yr old closes her eyes (& occasionally hides under a blanket) during all kissing scenes. I do not discourage this😀
@biggles14 it was so good!
@JaysGirlEmily and gloves! Protect those hands. Frostbite would not be good
@annetdonahue we used to have this same conversation at work when rob ford was mayor.
@rachelmack I've noticed that some US & UK freelancers ask for direct reader support on Patreon. Maybe that's the future of journalism
@rachelmack I'm at a loss for a good source of Canadian news. I'd like to subscribe to something and support Cdn journalism.
@ateDARYL prob depends on the episode. I think we traumatized them for life w/ Blink, but 12 yo has now been a fan for several years.
@ateDARYL ha! Mine are currently hooked on YouTube videos on extreme cake decorating. Go figure. What about sneaking in some Dr Who 😉
@ateDARYL I would have asked my kids but they're finally in bed. They may have seen every movie ever made aimed at 10 & unders😀
@ateDARYL @CommonSense I use it all the time. I find they over-estimate the appropriate age, but it's sooo helpful.
@ateDARYL I use common sense media when I'm stuck https://t.co/igTQ4fItbr (many in the list are animated, but you might find something)
@ateDARYL princess bride? Mine loved that at 6 and https://t.co/MYScWe8X7L Wars? Bedknobs and Broomsticks? Spy Kids was a hit too
@JodiesJumpsuit most of my wine spilling also occurs while I'm a guest at other people's houses, rather than in the privacy of my own home.
@ateDARYL guy at the butcher shop chatted w/ me today about spring training & his trip to Chicago to see the cubs. Spring is coming!
@JodiesJumpsuit you too? I also gesticulate more the more I drink. I routinely ruin tableclothes and break wine glasses
Winter clouds #dlws https://t.co/AOCroutqox
@HumandChuck i always feel the need to wash my hands if I accidentally touch it
@BlueJaysDad alas I have work to do, so will stop now. Normally i get preteen eye rolls at my puns, so always fun to find other connaisseurs
@BlueJaysDad aww! That made me so Happ-y.
@BlueJaysDad I see you've already starting spring training with a pun-ishing workout regime...
@monicarooney @JodiesJumpsuit I'm hopeless with plants but my office is orchid nirvana
@JodiesJumpsuit ha! Thanks! Feeling old (and not terribly festive) these days so not making a deal out of it but did have 🎂 and 🍷.
@monicarooney @JodiesJumpsuit gorgeous! I have some orchids in my office which just bloomed again and it's made my… https://t.co/POMSsQx4sG
@terri_to @JodiesJumpsuit also going to be some good wine consumed this weekend (had a birthday this week, so need to treat myself).
@terri_to @JodiesJumpsuit me too. Cute animals and story-bots are getting me through this week...
@BlueJaysDad Too funny! I'm Howell-ing with laughter...
@MerriamWebster a British colleague used "pants" in an email recently and I thought it was a typo. Now I know...
@_rallycap aww! That's the best. ❤
@JaysGirlEmily that makes me feel so old 😀
How considerate of @mcsweeneys to renew my winter depression on the day after my birthday... https://t.co/7K6pJYq0JQ
@lesley_mak one of the few vegetables I don't eat. My mother used to put green pepper bits in hamburgers. Ugh. Still traumatized.
@heidiheilig ooh - performance art for us Aquarians (and my birthday is even today 🎁)
@JonGatehouse very sorry to hear that...
@_MaJen Dolores is so much more believable than Voldemort. We are surrounded by more Umbridges every day
@_MaJen same for my kids. Also had discussions on how Umbridge was such an effective villain. She made the rules...
@junctionette @rachelmack although in Quebec at that time, gr 10 history was Quebec history. Very little mention of rest of Canada.
@junctionette @rachelmack that was my experience in MTL in the 80s. 20thC world history was optional course in Gr11.
@pwgfrank a professor and a movie star? I can't get the Gilligans island theme song out of my head following this Howell signing...
@TaoofStieb I'm hoping from some good Gilligan's Islands gifs too 🌴
@MissStaceyMay baseball also means sunshine. I miss the sun. I feel so tired without it.
@jk_rowling she read it but didn't get it
@biggles14 February at long last! Jan seemed much longer than 31 days this year...
@lesley_mak nicely put!
@osutein I'm already watching this in the movie theatre of my mind....
@osutein so many questions - Does the Rowling character have magic skills or ex-SAS? Is Snipes a vampire?
@osutein do they both play bad cop?
@osutein yes please!
@ateDARYL @JaysGirlEmily long dark winter. I miss the ☀️
This thread. https://t.co/EQMjyh3Vum
@ShaunKing @NYDailyNews as a Canadian, thanks for posting this. It's sickening. It is terrorism.
@anne_theriault I was handed white supremacist lit on Toronto subway last summer. Disguised as "preserving jobs for Cdns" lit.
@anne_theriault but we're very good at being smug.
@_rallycap @MissStaceyMay I've had many a bleak week when her newsletter has appeared like a ray of sunshine (particularly in the winter!)
@_rallycap and @MissStaceyMay always puts what I'm feeling into actual words (I think she's a mind reader). Her newsletters are such a treat
@LeenieK22 @_rallycap there can never be too many kind words! Particularly with the state of the world at the moment...
@lesley_mak @_rallycap omg they were soooo funny 😂
@_rallycap now gotta work my way thru the rest of this thread to look for new follows..
@_rallycap also @lesley_mak is great. starting following her for her hilarious hot stove tweets (also she has adorable cats...)
@_rallycap @KathieC67 @biggles14 Liz's countdown has been getting me through this dreary and gloomy winter!
@_rallycap you often brighten my day 😀
@_rallycap @thesmilinggoat @JodiesJumpsuit Yes - I totally agree (jump to it and follow Jumpsuit...)
@rstrolle I have a soft spot for Beauty by McKinley. First fairy tale retelling I read as a kid (which was a long time ago 😀)
@normwilner those eyes 👀
@zekecarrera3 hola! Welcome ❤️
@RLeesam agreed (even if they lose the game, still worth it - will never forget b9th of ALCS game 5)
@normwilner I never thought I'd be nostalgic for the 80s
@HeerJeet and Orwell. I started re-reading 1984 this weekend. All the commentary on manufacturing reality is disturbingly applicable.
@_DivyeshM @JodiesJumpsuit my 12 yo (who has similar taste) loves the Flash ( I like the show too)
@JodiesJumpsuit I'm totally on with you as Doc, Marty as a girl and a feminist Lorraine.
@JodiesJumpsuit let's ruin some childhoods & reboot BttFuture with female leading roles. I ❤the original, but this would be so much fun.
@_rallycap thx for this. FWIW thanks for keeping me laughing with your posts. Some of those laughs came when I most needed them!
@normwilner I don't think Orwell intended it as a 'how to' manual, however...
@normwilner Doublethink means the power of holding two contradictory beliefs in one’s mind simultaneously, and accepting both of them - 1984
@TaoofStieb full disclosure - I enjoy animation and superheroes, but it's nice to have a bit more variety in my movie watching now 😀
@TaoofStieb mine are 10 & 12 so we still see every animated and superhero film release. But they loved Hidden Figures - so there's hope!
@TaoofStieb parenthood?
@fifthstarter @HumandChuck we've gone from reality to reality tv, except we all have to live in this tv show now.
@lesley_mak because it's actually happening? (I feel as though I'm in the worst reality tv show ever...)
@gold_lilies @rstrolle yes! Would recommend Mckinley as well. Her B&B was the first modern fairy tale retelling I read (back in the 80s)
@osutein my husband & I both travel for work periodically & we've each managed to keep them alive on our own for the past 12 yrs.
@osutein it's the whole "dads who babysit" phenomena. Guess what? If you're looking after your own kid - it's not babysitting.
@melissasfeed truth and reality
@dog_rates I'm really more of a cat person, but am going to have to follow now😀 🐶
@rstrolle thank you!
@rstrolle kid wants to know the name of this book, if you don't mind posting it😀(I think the reference to waffles did it...)
@rstrolle just showed these to my YA book obsessed 12 yo daughter. Her response "awesome - can we go there?" 😀(we're in 🇨🇦)
@_rallycap awwww...what a cutie (gave me some major baby nostalgia)
@JodiesJumpsuit You're right. He must be a Slitheen...
@ddale8 And i'm enjoying today's photos. Really appreciate your work.
@Cekent I don't think he's capable of smiling
@HumandChuck and I was hoping this Raptors game would cheer me up 🙁
@melissasfeed i feel like we've now been set back 100 years and I don't even live in the US...
@melissasfeed my kids (10 and 12) don't remember any other president. 😀
@ddale8 also the worst twilight zone episode ever...
@MerriamWebster @mturetsky this is fabtastic. O frabjous day!
@ParkerMolloy did you make copy of the documents prior to submitting them? If so, I'd start by using that as proof.
@davidfrum e e cummings (nobody, not even the rain, has such small hands...)
@Cekent life is imitating a Simpsons episode right now on so many levels...
